Name: GamehubAPI 2.4 (ALPHA)
Desc: New gamehubAPI, looking for a better way to handle scoreboads aswell as allowing backwards compatability with older versions of the API

Version.ChangelogNote: Added the backupSystem and added a ovmf(overwriteManagerFile) mode to quickuseAPi.apiConfScoreboardConnector (over_cli) allowing to overwrite the apiConf one, making sconfigs more versitile.
